snippet.title: Sneak Peek: "The Ultimate Banana Game" – A Satirical Idle Game
snippet.description:
"The Ultimate Banana Game" - a satirical mashup of a visual novel and idle game that dives into the gaming industry’s shadier practices. 

What’s the game about?

You play as a developer launching a “Banana” game on the Crescent platform. Start small by buying fake reviews and influencer streams, then grow your empire by adding lootboxes, setting up virtual casinos, and even running shady crowdfunding campaigns for projects you’ll never deliver.

It’s a fun and satirical take on the industry’s darker side, and it’s completely free because we want to share this story with as many people as possible!

You can already add the game to wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3397750/The_ULTIMATE_Banana_Game/
